abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Razor-tipped Claws is 5.

abilities.name: Rampaging Charge
abilities.timing: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.description: The Slaughterbrute crashes into the enemy's ranks in a frenzy of destruction.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If the target unit is Infantry, double the amount of mortal damage inflicted.

abilities.name: Sigils of Domination
abilities.description: By carving runes of domination into a Slaughterbrute's back and driving cursed blades of binding into its flesh, the monster's will can be bound to a champion of Chaos.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Slaves to Darkness Hero within this unit's combat range to be this unit's master.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, while this unit is within its master's combat range, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.
